title: Evaluating Progress in Regulatory Reforms to Promote Financial Stability
content: For release on delivery   12:30 p.m. EDT   May 3, 2013            Evaluating Progress in Regulatory Reforms to Promote Financial Stability        Remarks by    Daniel K. Tarullo    Member    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at the    Peterson Institute for International Economics    Washington, D.C.             May 3, 2013
